SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model

Class SimplifiedPersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model.SimplifiedPersonalBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SimplifiedPersonalBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a simplified version of a player's personal board in the game.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SimplifiedPersonalBoard

      public SimplifiedPersonalBoard(int xMin, int xMax, int yMax, int yMin, int score, ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions, ArrayList<Point> playablePositions, ArrayList<Point> blockedPositions, Card secretMission, Map<Symbol,Integer> visibleResources, int selectedX, int selectedY, String nickname)
      Constructs a simplified personal board with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      xMin - Minimum X coordinate of the board.
      xMax - Maximum X coordinate of the board.
      yMax - Maximum Y coordinate of the board.
      yMin - Minimum Y coordinate of the board.
      score - Score associated with the personal board.
      occupiedPositions - List of positions occupied on the board.
      playablePositions - List of positions playable on the board.
      blockedPositions - List of blocked positions on the board.
      secretMission - Secret mission card associated with the player.
      visibleResources - Map of visible resources (symbols and quantities) on the board.
      selectedX - Selected X coordinate on the board.
      selectedY - Selected Y coordinate on the board.
      nickname - Nickname of the player owning the board.

    • SimplifiedPersonalBoard

      public SimplifiedPersonalBoard(PersonalBoard personalBoard, String nickname)
      Constructs a simplified personal board based on the given `PersonalBoard` object and nickname.
      Parameters:
      personalBoard - PersonalBoard object to be simplified.
      nickname - Nickname of the player owning the board.
